channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Latin American Fact-Checkers Brace for Meta's Next Moves
item.description: So far Meta has only abandoned fact-checking in the US. If and when it expands, the move will be a major blow to the Latin American news ecosystem.

item.title: The 25 Best Shows on Amazon Prime Right Now (January 2025)
item.description: Citadel: Diana, The Rig, and Fallout are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: What’s behind ballooning video game budgets?
item.description: Why does it cost some companies hundreds of millions of dollars to develop a popular video game? A couple weeks ago, The New York Times blamed the nev...

item.title: These Maps Show Just How Dry Southern California Is Right Now
item.description: In early January, soil moisture in much of Southern California was in the bottom 2 percent of historical records.

item.title: Researchers open source Sky-T1, a ‘reasoning’ AI model that can be trained for less than $450
item.description: So-called reasoning AI models are becoming easier — and cheaper — to develop. On Friday, NovaSky, a team of researchers based out of UC Berkeley’s Sky...

item.title: Apple board opposes proposal to abolish DEI programs
item.description: Apple’s board of directors has come out in opposition to a proposal seeking to end the company’s Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) programs. In a...

item.title: Shure MV6 Review: A Clean Looking Gaming Mic
item.description: Shure’s new USB gaming mic looks familiar, but it might be too streamlined.

item.title: A Glowing Metal Ring Crashed to Earth. No One Knows Where It Came From
item.description: The 1,100-pound mystery object landed in Kenya at the end of December. Experts are still baffled.

item.title: I got soaked driving the Arc Sport electric boat
item.description: I did not go to CES 2025 with the goal of getting drenched by Lake Mead’s chilly January waters. But when I discovered Los Angeles-based boat startup ...

item.title: Everything you missed at CES 2025
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review. I missed you! This week, we’re diving into all the gadgets and announcements out of this year’s CES, Meta’s decision t...
